books.description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.
books.title: House of Cards

books.description: A blind lawyer with his other senses superhumanly enhanced fights crime as a costumed superhero.
books.title: Daredevil

books.description: The story of Piper Chapman, a woman in her thirties who is sentenced to fifteen months in prison after being convicted of a decade-old crime of transporting money for her drug-dealing girlfriend.
books.title: Orange Is the New Black

books.description: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.
books.title: Arrested Development

books.description: In a world replete with greed, betrayal, sexual intrigue and rivalry, "Marco Polo" is based on the famed explorer's adventures in Kublai Khan's court in 13th century China.
books.title: Marco Polo

books.description: A family of adult siblings find that their secrets and scars are revealed when their black sheep of a brother returns home.
books.title: Bloodline

books.description: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the '90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show "Horsin' Around," but today he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.
books.title: BoJack Horseman

books.description: A teenage girl is brutally murdered, sparking a hunt for her killer. But in a town where everyone hides a secret, will they find the monster among them?
books.title: Hemlock Grove

books.description: A police investigation, the saga of a grieving family, and a Seattle mayoral campaign all interlock after the body of 17-year-old Rosie Larsen is found in the trunk of a submerged car.
books.title: The Killing

books.description: A program that follows a couple who must navigate the exhilarations and humiliations of intimacy, commitment and other things they were hoping to avoid.
books.title: Love

books.description: The personal and professional life of Dev, a 30-year-old actor in New York.
books.title: Master of None

books.description: Will Arnett will star as a self-help guru who needs a decent amount of help himself.
books.title: Flaked

books.description: A former superhero decides to reboot her life by becoming a private investigator.
books.title: Jessica Jones

books.description: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.
books.title: Narcos

books.description: When the patriarch of a prominent family dies, his heirs battle to determine who will gain control of his beloved soccer team: The Cuervos of Nuevo Toledo.
books.title: Club de Cuervos

books.description: Filmed over a 10-year period, Making a Murderer is an unprecedented real-life thriller about Steven Avery, a DNA exoneree who, while in the midst of exposing corruption in local law enforcement, finds himself the prime suspect in a grisly new crime.
books.title: Making a Murderer

books.description: A group of people around the world are suddenly linked mentally, and must find a way to survive being hunted by those who see them as a threat to the world's order.
books.title: Sense8

books.description: D.J. Tanner-Fuller is a widow and mother of three. Things become too much to handle, so she asks for help from her sister Stephanie and her best friend Kimmy.
books.title: Fuller House

books.description: Bob and David emerge from the time machine they entered sixteen years ago and are reunited with the cast of Mr. Show.
books.title: w/ Bob & David
